Text: vacation notice Cc A brief farewell Today Friday the th is my departure date to the tombstones of Egypt please wish me luck I will be roughing it out for the next month on trains planes boats tennis shoes and a backpack on my back What started out as an easy pleasant and classy star hotel kind of trip ended up as a low budget high impact trip to cover more grounds and to keep spending in check No rocks will be unturned I am taking requests for lightweight souvenirs from France Paris Nice the French Alps Switzerland Lake Geneva Greece Athens Mykonos Crete and Egypt Alexandria to Aswan This is a bribe for being away from work for a month without a laptop Sorry I dont think I can access email on trains I will check voice messages and email through my account periodically If all is well I will be back in the office May th Vicky
